name: Shigeru Aoba/Rebuild
description: Shigeru Aoba(青葉シゲル?) is a fictional character from theRebuild of Evangelionfilm series. He hold the ranks of First Liteunant and is one of the three main computer technicians atNERV Headquarters, alongsideMakoto HyugaandMaya Ibuki.

name: Hitomi Kaga
description: She is a talented woman with a PhD in metaphysics. After entering NERV, she was appointed to the Project E. Her main job is to further develop Evangelion units like being involved in production of dummy systems and dummy plugsRecognized for her excellence byKōzō Fuyutsuki, who knew her father who was also a physicist. She is clumsy, for example, using green tea leaves when making black tea blends and using the men's shower. She has a strong emotional personality, and she often lets her emotio...

name: Sakura Suzuhara
description: Sakura does not look like her brother at all. She has long brown hair and fair skin. She wears a unique uniform in the WILLE consisting of a white and gray dress with a pocket and dark legging stopping below the knees. She also wears a black beret and a blue scarf around her neck. Apparently, she does not seem to know about her brother's whereabouts.

name: Mr. Langley
description: Langley, first name unknown, is a Caucasian American, considering Asuka is a quarter-Japanese, quarter-German (asKyoko Zeppelin Sohryu, Asuka's mother, is half-German, half-Japanese) and has American citizenship.Nonetheless, Asuka talks with her stepmother on the phone in German,and is mentioned to have come from Germany before reaching Tokyo-3, so despiteKajiacting as her guardian, Langley likely speaks German and lives there. He is only seen for a brief moment in a flashback holding a child...

attributes.Relations: Asuka Langley Sohryu (Daughter) Kyoko Zeppelin Sohryu (Wife) Unnamed doctor (Second wife

name: Naoko Akagi
description: She was the chief scientist ofGehirn,NERV's predecessor organization, and the designer of theMagisupercomputers, which she copied her own thought patterns onto. Naoko felt that the Magi represented the three aspects of her personality: herself as a scientist (Melchior-1), herself as a mother (Balthasar-2), and herself as a woman (Casper-3). She was also heavily involved in the creation of the Evangelion Project withGendo Ikari.

attributes.First: The Birth of NERV [ NGE ] Volume 8 [ Manga

name: Nene Matsukaze
description: Nene Matsukaze(松風ネネ,Matsukaze Nene?) is an original character fromNeon Genesis Evangelion SIDE STORY 2 ~ Feast of Dolls ~visual novel game. She is a transfer student that moved in 2-A class. She always carries a teddy bear, which she believes the spirit "Sandy-san" lives inside it.

name: Rei Ayanami/ANIMA
description: InNeon Genesis Evangelion: ANIMA, she is the third Rei after the previous one died in the battle againstArmisael. She is wad given a number as"Rei Trois"("trois" being French for "three") and is initially able to connect with other clones via a mental mirror toRei Quatre,Rei CinqandRei Sixas secondaries bodies. By doing this she could control them as extensions of her limbs, senses, and thoughts. This ability was a result of training rather than technology, and at the time, no known method ex...

attributes.Relations: Yui Ikari (Derivative) Rei Quatre (Clone) Rei Cinq (Clone) Rei Six (Clone

name: Insubstantial Angel
description: The design concept seems to take whatRitsuko Akagisaid aboutSandalphon's "chrysalis" to heart, by having the entity go through larval and pupal (chrysalis) stages before reaching adulthood ("imago"). As a chrysalis, it can teleport short distances and in its true form can levitate, extend the three spikes from each spinning wheel-like structure on its sides into a blade, and fire green energy balls from it's body.

name: Shateiel
description: It is described as an "optical combat weapon" enshrouded by a rotating, crystal-like, multifaceted plate. It absorbs and stores electromagnetic energy, which it can then convert and use in attacks. The converted energy is apparently released through thecore-like orbs on either end of its symmetrical body.

name: Wheeljack
description: Wheeljack, among theAutobots, traveled to Earth and arrived in aTokyo-3, being menaced byAngels.Wheeljack witnessed the ghost ofStarscreampossess one of the creatures, becoming the monstrous giant Angel-Scream.During the battle between Angel-Scream and the Evangelion-poweredOptimus Prime, Wheeljack was contacted through radio byMisato Katsuragiwho warned himNERVhad no Evangelions left and were relying on Prime to defeat the Angel-Decepticon. After their victory, the Autobots joined forces wit...

name: Armisael
description: Armisael initially appears as a rapidly revolving ring of light, double-helical in form, which may represent aPlasmidWP. Itspatterncycles between blue and orange, from whichRitsuko Akagiconcludes that the Angel does not have a fixed form. The two helices eventually fuse together, and the ring severs at a single point to take on a thread-like form, several times longer than anEVA'sheight.

name: Koji Takao
description: Koji Takao is a bald, imposing man with a goatee and is the ship's engineer. He controls the engine ignition sequence. He is a friend ofRyoji Kajiand seems to knowMisato Katsuragi's reckless strategies well and judge her as an "interesting captain". His personality seems calm. When Misato Katsuragi orders them to fly and fight theNemesis series, few crew members are afraid of dying, but Koji comments that you will die when you die, makingMidori Kitakamiwonder how is he still alive at that age...

description: Nozomi is a young girl with medium long brown hair usually tied in a left side ponytail using a ribbon with two pink balls and a yellow hairpin. She usually wears a sleeves shirt with horizontal white and pink stripes. She wears pink shoes with hearts, long socks and short pants.

name: Galvatron
description: Upon gaining the power of anAngelby possessing its body,Starscreammused about using his newfound power against Galvatron for revenge, but he first decided to get rid ofOptimus Primeonce and for all.

name: Mari
description: Mari(マリ?) is a fictional character from theNeon Genesis Evangelion: ANIMAnovel. She shares the same name asMari Illustrious Makinamiand looks like a young version of her, the two don't seem to be literally related. She pilots theUS Evangelion/Wolfpack.

name: Adovaquiel
description: This Angel is similar to a gigantic jellyfish. Its head has the shape of a bell, and many eyes are all over in it. From the lower part of the head hangs a structure with a rhomboidal shape, and several tentacles start at its side. Itscoreis not visible, possibly being inside it.

name: Sideswipe
description: Sideswipe was among the Autobots who boardedSky Lynxand traveled toTokyo-3on Earth, Mode "EVA" chapter 1 where he witnessed the ghost of Starscream possess the body of an Angel. Mode "EVA" chapter 2 When Optimus Prime scanned Evangelion Unit-01, growing greatly in size in order to take onStarscream, Sideswipe got anxious and asked Prime to confirm that he was feeling alright. Following Starscream's defeat, Sideswipe aidedNERVstaff in renovating Prime's trailer into a mobile base.

name: Ritsuko Akagi/ANIMA
description: InNeon Genesis Evangelion: ANIMA, after the attack on theNERV Headquartersby theMass Production Evangelionsand their subsequent destruction, she was inside theChronostatic Sphereand therefore was considered MIA (Missing In Action). Her glasses and position were both inherited byMaya Ibuki.

name: Barachiel
description: Barachiel bears some similarity to a large bacteria, with a yellow liquid membrane around a dark central sphere with many long internal spines going from the core to the outer edge of the membrane. What appears to be its core exists at its exact center. The only artwork of the Angel implies it is larger than some buildings, being clearly visible fromUnit-01from afar. In the scenario in which it appears, it is shown to move around by rolling and to be amphibious regularly diving into Lake Ashi...

name: Turel
description: It is designed as a floating white "monolith" with an appearance like a face crowned by four spikes and wearing a very tall, steep miter adorned with a blue gem. It is described as extremely powerful, seems impervious to all attacks, and steadfastly seeks out its targets with the aim of self-destruction.

name: Kaworu Nagisa/Rebuild
description: Kaworu appears inEvangelion: 1.0 You Are (Not) Alone, rising from a coffin on the Moon in sight of an EVA-sized giant in a white covering (Evangelion Mark.06under construction). He speaks to Keel Lorenz (via his monolith), agreeing that "the child" is progressing as predicted in theDead Sea Scrolls, and saying that "The Third is still the same." He ends the conversation saying that he hopes to meet Shinji Ikari. Bizarrely, Kaworu appears to be capable of breathing and even speaking in the abs...

description: Quatre and several other Ayanami clones appear forming an international Anti-Angel hunting task force known as the "Sword of Damocles" network; formed on behalf of NERV with Rei II andRei No. Troisserving as leaders of the force. The later clones were produced at the same time and have nearly identical figures and appearances with the exception ofRei Six, who is physically only seven years old. To differentiate them, they were given different hair colors. Rei Quatre, the fourth clone, has sil...

name: Hawk
description: A subordinate ofKyoya Kenzaki, who belongs to the special agency NERV Security Intelligence Department. "Hawk" is not his real name. Depending on the path you choose, he becomes aSEELEspy for money and confronts Kyoya. He is a talented subordinate who faithfully performs his duties.

name: Sky Lynx
description: Sky Lynx in his space shuttle mode arrived on Earth carrying a team ofAutobotson board just as aAngelwere advancing onTokyo-3.
